task_description: 生成'堂食'3D卡通风格功能图标，表达在店内就餐的概念，采用Q版可爱的餐桌就餐场景设计

input_data.text_prompt: A cute 3D cartoon icon of a dining table scene in Pixar animation style. Features: a small rounded wooden dining table (#8B4513, #D2691E wood tones) with warm texture, neatly arranged white ceramic tableware (#F5F5DC) including bowls and chopsticks or cutlery, metallic utensils with silver sheen (#C0C0C0), an optional navy blue chair (#2B4A7C) echoing brand IP image. The scene conveys a cozy, comfortable, and formal in-store dining atmosphere. Shot from a 3/4 top-down viewing angle. High-gloss plastic and ceramic texture, wood grain table surface, metallic cutlery highlights. Optional simple food silhouette for added warmth. Dual lighting setup: top-down main light + 45-degree frontal fill light. Pure white or transparent background. Commercial-grade quality with high-resolution details. Must match the style of food icons for brand consistency. Warm, inviting, and professional dining experience visualization.
design_requirements: 突出温馨舒适的就餐氛围
餐桌圆润可爱，餐具摆放整齐
木质纹理和陶瓷质感清晰
input_data.reference_style: 类似input\吼巷\设计\IP\微信图片_20250923171141_52_171.png的3D卡通风格

metadata.application_scenario: 在店内就餐概念可视化
metadata.notes: 采用Pixar卡通美学，强调温馨舒适的就餐氛围，与品牌IP形象保持一致
